entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
